title: Rostra
mission: Rostra is dedicted to build a decentralized education and research system, so as to promoto the open access and innovation of knowledge.

edu.title: The problems of the current education system

admittance.title: Access Mechanism
admittance.description: Use score as the single dimension to measure whether a person can obtain good education resources

system.title: Education System
system.description:
The idea of education is outdated. People are treated as line products, everyone is learning at the same pace, diversified and individualized education cannot be provided 
 The knowledge system is updating slow, while not keeping up with the change of times

evaluation.title: Competency Assessment System
evaluation.description:
Centralization of power of the certification authority
 Certificate is only one-sided, can not show individual ability and character stereoscopically

autonomy.title: Governance Mechanism
autonomy.description: For those students who are most concerned about their future, on the contrary，they have no right to govern

reward.title: Reward Mechanism
reward.description: Students have to pay high tuition fees in advance for several years, while cannot apply what they learned to related area, even hard to find suitable job safter graduation

changes.title: What Can Rostra Bring to Change
changes.edu:
Education: 
Promote equitable access to knowledge
Promote social diversity, encourage and support self-exploration
Make personalized education truly viable
Make learners acquire the lastest knowledge in time 
Decentralize the authority of certificate issuance and form a decentralized capability evaluation system
 Learn to earn
changes.research:
Research: 
Establish reasonable ownership mechanisms， so as to let individuals have the ownership of their own scientific research
Change the reward mechanism of scientific research
Form a decentralized system of value discovery and evaluation
Speed up the transformation process of scientific research achievements
Promote the open access to scientific research

how.title: How to achieve?
how.description:
Open Source + Block Chain
Rostra will ultilize open source softwares and block chain technology to provide a new model of knowledge governance, thus to lead the innovation of education and research
